docs.text:
Tip:
 You can use PayPal to pay for products on my 
Sellfy
 store.




Templates


Templates
 are "complete games," designed to teach you.  You can also use them to make your own games to sell or give away.








Docs


Get It @


Description










Action Pack #1


NA


No longer for sale.






Asteroids


Marketplace
, 
Sellfy


A basic implementation of the classic game "Asteroids,"...






Balloon Pop


Marketplace
, 
Sellfy


Basic "Pop the Balloons" game suitable for new game developers. Comes with three (3) versions of the game.






Breakout


Marketplace
, 
Sellfy


This is a basic "Breakout"-style game suitable for new game developers. It comes with four (4) versions of the game.






Musical Memory


Marketplace
, 
Sellfy


"Simon"-like game using Corona.






Missile Command


Marketplace
, 
Sellfy


"Missile Command" is a classic game that introduces fundamental game development concepts. Includes four versions of game.






Pig Dice Game


Marketplace
, 
Sellfy


"Pig" dice game "made using Corona.






Sliding Puzzle


Marketplace
, 
Sellfy


This set contains basic "Sliding Puzzle" game templates suitable for new game developers. It comes with three (3) versions of the game.






Tic-Tac-Toe


Marketplace
, 
Sellfy


Tic-Tac-Toe is one of the fundamental games all beginning game developers should make. This package comes with five (5) versions of the game.






Whack-a-Mole


Marketplace
, 
Sellfy


"Whack-a-Mole" is an often-overlooked game that all new developers should re-make at least once. This package comes with four (4) versions of the game.










Plugins


Plugins
 are libraries/modules distributed through the Corona plugin system.








Docs


Get It @


Description










Image Sheet/Sprite Helpers


Marketplace


On a budget?  Use a free texture packer ( 
ShoeBox
, 
Free Texture Packer
, 
Leshy Sprite Tool
) for now, then update to 
Texture Packer
 when you have the cash. No need to re-write your code....






Patcher


Marketplace


This plugin allows you to download and execute/
require()
 scripts...










Core Products








Docs


Price


Description












FREE


SUPERCHARGING 
Corona
 game development every day.  
Get It Now!










Tools


Tools
(tools) are complete solutions to common Corona game and app design problems.








Starter


Description










RGPE2


Roaming Gamer Particle Editor 2
 (aka RGPE2) is a 
FREE
 particle editor for creating emitter definition files for use with the 
Corona
 
newEmitter()
 function.








Requesting Something


Do you have a cool idea?  Am I missing a product that is critical to your game or app?


Whatever the case, you can ask me to make it 
HERE
.  Just make a post with these details:




Title
 - Roaming Gamer: Can You Make XYZ?


Body
 - Describe the thing you want me to make.  Try to be as clear as possible.




I will respond as soon as I see the post and we will proceed from there.  


Thank You!




  Copyright 
 Roaming Gamer, LLC. 2008-2017; All Rights Reserved
